column4: mp3 playback is incredibly glitchy since i switched to 64bit, googled a bit, but can't solve it... :(
try converting all your mp3s to a better supported format, it might solve it ;)
yeah, i tried that first, on this install... the converted vorbis files are glitchy when played back on other systems... so i've converted some albums to vorbis on a different system as a workaround.
i hope i said that in a way that made sense.
